concept.definition: Used to match a value according to FHIR Search rules (e.g., Patient/123, Encounter/2002).
The key value in the topic stream is an active members of the reference set identified by the concept provided as the filter value.
The key value in the topic stream is NOT an active members of the reference set identified by the concept provided as the filter value.
The key value is subsumes the value in the filter value.
The key value is subsumed by the value in the filter value.

description: Operator to apply to filter label.
name: SubscriptionFilterByMatchType

text.div:
SubscriptionFilterByMatchType

Operator to apply to filter label.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/subscription-operator defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
= =Used to match a value according to FHIR Search rules (e.g., Patient/123, Encounter/2002).
in inThe key value in the topic stream is an active members of the reference set identified by the concept provided as the filter value.
not-in not-inThe key value in the topic stream is NOT an active members of the reference set identified by the concept provided as the filter value.
above aboveThe key value is subsumes the value in the filter value.
below belowThe key value is subsumed by the value in the filter value.

title: SubscriptionFilterByMatchType
